description: Lightweight, comfortable long-sleeved shirt for trekking and outdoor life in the summer. Made from a soft, functional fabric that wicks away moisture and feels cool against the skin. A convenient garment that takes little space in a pack – practical when space is limited. Well-fitting cut and ventilation opening at the yoke to release excess heat. Buttons at the front and a vertical chest pocket with zipper and mesh lining. Sleeve buttons keep rolled-up sleeves in place.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Hike LS Shirt - Solid - Mens
